title: Awesome Tie Knots: How to Tie the Most Unique & Stylish Neck

Awesome Tie Knots: How to Tie the Most Unique & Stylish Necktie Knots for Men

Publisher: Michael Melrose
Michael Melrose 
ASIN: B00CBKIKWM  
English 
36 Pages 
PDF 
955 KB

Awesome Tie Knots is the only book that shows how to tie the coolest tie knots in the world - unique and stylish knots including the Eldredge, Ediety, and Han.
 
Chapters 1 and 2 gives you a bit of history surrounding the modern necktie as well as what patterns go best with what types of ties and how to pair ties with knots to get the most impact and the most compliments. Dress yourself up and get noticed for a job interview, a night on the town, or a hot date. 

In Awesome Tie Knots, you'll...

Learn step-by-step how to tie 6 of the coolest knots in the world, with each knot illustrated and described as you tie it.

Each knot features step-by-step and even 'in-between-the-steps' illustrations you won't find anywhere else online - they were created specifically for this book.

The steps to tying each knot are also well described so you can read how to tie the knots too. The detailed illustrations are made exclusively for this book and are not published anywhere else!

Finally, a Resources chapter gives you links to video resources so you can watch exactly how to tie them also.

Hundreds of readers are learning how to tie the most awesome tie knots in the world with this book!

 Want to get more compliments at work
 Want to look sharp and impress a date?
 Want to get noticed during a job interview?

==============================

How to Tie: Learn How to Tie a Tie In 6 Easy Steps

Publisher: CreateSpace Independent Publishing Platform  
2011
Robert Seiffert 
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1466294140
ISBN-13: 978-1466294141
ASIN: B005K1QZVC 
English 
66 Pages 
PDF 
1.66 MB

 Whether you are looking for a new necktie knot to express your personal style, or just need to learn how to tie an easy knot in a hurry, "How to Tie" can help. this guide describes how to easily tie the most popular men's knots in only 6 steps each, with photos illustrating every move.
 While your first few attempts at a new knot may not turn out perfectly, rest assured that with a little practice you will soon be able to tie each one quickly and professionally.
